title: What about I.F.C?
creator_credit: Don Murray, Film Australia and Arch Nicholson
brief_description: Comparison with another firm in the same business and of approximately the same size can be of immense value to management in evaluating their own firm’s performance. The film is directed at management of firms from the smallest grocer to the largest corporation and is designed to show the advantages of I.F.C. The film is directed at small firms and large corporations.
